subject: Shipping to Poland
description_text:
Hi,

I wanted to check the shipping cost of the Simsonn Plus X pedals to Poland,
but in checkout I noticed that Poland is not available for shipping. Is
there any option for shipping to Poland? And if so, how much would it cost
approximately?

Thanks,
Maciek

conversations.body_text: Hi Maciek,  Customers in Poland can place orders directly through our Polish distributor, and the products will be shipped locally from Poland  https:/fmic.pl/elektronika/simracing?product_brand=Simsonn
